name: part_002
file: tmp_【 #ねぽらぼアイドル衣装 】雪花ラミィのアイドル衣装お披露目！【雪花ラミィ⧸ホロライブ】 [VzozxWBBVJA]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Lamy performs a short, energetic dance on stage in her new idol outfit.
MC section where Lamy discusses her outfit details with her friends, followed by a 'slot' pose challenge where different members choose her pose for each part of her body.
Outro featuring a beautiful illustration of Lamy in her idol outfit.

subtitles.original: かわいい！
subtitles.english: So cute!

subtitles.original: いいね！
subtitles.english: Nice!

subtitles.original: なにげにこの足元の靴下もね、かわいいね、めちゃくちゃ。
subtitles.english: By the way, these socks on my feet are also really, really cute.

subtitles.original: めちゃかわいい！そうなのよ！
subtitles.english: Super cute! They really are!

subtitles.original: これあれじゃん！お花の…あの、髪飾りの柄だ。
subtitles.english: Wait, look at this! It's the flower... the same pattern as my hair ornament.

subtitles.original: そうそうそうそう！
subtitles.english: Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah!

subtitles.original: リボンもなんか付いてるんだけど。
subtitles.english: There's also a ribbon attached to it.

subtitles.original: どうしたの？取れたの？
subtitles.english: What happened? Did it come off?

subtitles.original: あ、そう、靴下に持ってきたんだよ、靴下に。ぷいってね。
subtitles.english: Ah, right, I moved it down to the socks. Just like that.

subtitles.original: 今回は…今回は、このアイドル衣装だから、ちょっとシンプルめにね。
subtitles.english: This time... since it's an idol outfit, I made it a bit on the simpler side.

subtitles.original: あのね、帽子を引き立たせるために、そうしました。
subtitles.english: You see, I did that to make the hat stand out.

subtitles.original: おー！めちゃいいじゃん！凝ってるよ！
subtitles.english: Ooh! That's great! It's so stylish!

subtitles.original: みんな、どこが一番好き？
subtitles.english: What part do you all like best?

subtitles.original: どこ？えー…
subtitles.english: Which part? Hmm...

subtitles.original: うーん、ラミィたんのお顔！
subtitles.english: Umm, Lamy-tan's face!

subtitles.original: あー、やめてー！
subtitles.english: Aah, stop it!

subtitles.original: 何着ててもかわいいよ！
subtitles.english: You're cute no matter what you wear!

subtitles.original: ありがとう！もももも…
subtitles.english: Thank you! *Muttering happily*

subtitles.original: やめてくれる？顔、顔がすごく…
subtitles.english: Can you stop? Your face, your face is just...

subtitles.original: （笑い声）
subtitles.english: (Laughter)

subtitles.original: 顔ね。あ、ねねちゃんは？
subtitles.english: My face, huh. Ah, what about Nene-chan?

subtitles.original: 団長は…やっぱり足元のその、やっぱりストッキングじゃなくて、靴下、ソックス！
subtitles.english: As for me... I really like the feet, not the stockings, but the socks!

subtitles.original: やっぱりお花があるのがめちゃめちゃかわいいなと思って。
subtitles.english: I thought the flowers on them were really, really cute.

subtitles.original: ありがとう！細いし、足。
subtitles.english: Thank you! And your legs are so thin.

subtitles.original: え、なんかさ、それ、ねねちゃんもしかして自分が雪の柄奪っちゃったからその贖罪の…
subtitles.english: Wait, maybe Nene-chan gave you those for atonement since she stole the snow pattern...?

subtitles.original: ば、バレちゃった？めちゃめちゃたくさん雪の柄…
subtitles.english: I'm b-busted? I do have a lot of snow patterns...

subtitles.original: そんなお揃い感はあるよね、ねねちゃんパイと。
subtitles.english: There's definitely a matching feel there with Nene-chan.

subtitles.original: そうだね、おそろち、おそろち。
subtitles.english: That's right, matching, matching.

subtitles.original: 並びたいなー。
subtitles.english: I want to stand next to you.

subtitles.original: え、なんかもう一個、うちら三人からポーズ指定していいかな？
subtitles.english: Um, can the three of us specify one more pose for you?

subtitles.original: え、どうする？どういう感じで？なんかみんな…
subtitles.english: Eh, what should I do? In what way? Everyone...

subtitles.original: じゃ、スロットで行こう、スロットで。
subtitles.english: Then let's go with a 'slot', a slot.

subtitles.original: スロット？どういうこと？
subtitles.english: Slot? What do you mean?

subtitles.original: ぽるこにが顔の角度やって…
subtitles.english: Pol-koni will decide the face angle...

subtitles.original: ノエルちゃんが…何だっけ？上半身やって…
subtitles.english: Noel-chan will... what was it? Do the upper body...

subtitles.original: マリンが下半身を。
subtitles.english: And Marine will do the lower body.

subtitles.original: 上半身、オッケーオッケー。
subtitles.english: Upper body, okay, okay.

subtitles.original: お、下半身のマリンね。任せろ！下半身のことなら。
subtitles.english: Oh, Marine for the lower body. Leave it to me! I'm the expert on lower bodies.

subtitles.original: どこからやる？そしたら。
subtitles.english: Where should we start then?

subtitles.original: え、待って、上から順じゃないの？こういうの。
subtitles.english: Wait, shouldn't we go from the top down? For these things.

subtitles.original: ぽちゃま角度やるよ。ぽるこに先輩から。
subtitles.english: I'll do the face angle. Starting from Pol-koni-senpai.

subtitles.original: うんっとね、左にちょっと傾けて。
subtitles.english: Umm, tilt your head a little to the left.

subtitles.original: 左にちょっと…オッケー。
subtitles.english: A little to the left... Okay.

subtitles.original: いいね！それだけ？
subtitles.english: Nice! Is that all?

subtitles.original: え、表情、表情の指定と。
subtitles.english: Um, and specifying the expression, the expression.

subtitles.original: 表情？じゃあ、こに困った顔好きだから困った顔がいいな。
subtitles.english: Expression? Well, since I love troubled faces, a troubled face would be good.

subtitles.original: 照れてるような感じの。あ、あらららら！女優、女優！いいよいいよ！
subtitles.english: Like you're blushing. Oh, my, my! An actress, a real actress! Good, good!

subtitles.original: 上半身！やっぱり団長マッスルポーズが好きだからマッスルじゃない？
subtitles.english: Upper body! Since I love muscle poses, it's gotta be muscles, right?

subtitles.original: スロット！嘘でしょ？
subtitles.english: Slot! You're kidding, right?

subtitles.original: ガショーン！いいねいいね！
subtitles.english: *Clank!* Nice, nice!

subtitles.original: ちょっと待って！バランス悪いぞ！
subtitles.english: Wait a minute! The balance is terrible!

subtitles.original: いやでもね、下半身決めてくれる。
subtitles.english: No, but really, let me decide the lower body.

subtitles.original: 船長はやっぱり、女の子はね、膝から崩れ落ちてるのがいいと思う。
subtitles.english: I think for girls, collapsing to their knees is the best.

subtitles.original: 膝から崩れ落ちて！はい、崩れ落ちて、ラミィたん。
subtitles.english: Collapse to your knees! Come on, collapse, Lamy-tan.

subtitles.original: どういうことなの？もうちょっと足開こうか？
subtitles.english: What do you mean? Should I spread my legs more?

subtitles.original: やだよ！開かないで！
subtitles.english: No! Don't spread them!

subtitles.original: もう！かわいくないじゃん！やだちょっと、船長！
subtitles.english: Geez! That's not cute at all! Stop it, Senchou!

subtitles.original: （笑い声）
subtitles.english: (Laughter)

subtitles.original: 上半身戦犯だよこれ！これはやっぱりノエル先輩が戦犯だわ。
subtitles.english: The upper body is the culprit here! This is definitely Noel-senpai's fault.

subtitles.original: やっちゃったやっちゃった。
subtitles.english: I did it, I did it.

subtitles.original: 足元…え、もう終わり？終わり？
subtitles.english: The feet... eh, is it over already? Is it over?

subtitles.original: もしかしてお時間なので。
subtitles.english: Because it's probably time.

subtitles.original: あ、そうなの？みんなありがとうね！
subtitles.english: Ah, is that so? Thank you everyone!

subtitles.original: ありがとう！かわいかったよ、ラミィたん！ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you! You were so cute, Lamy-tan! Thank you!

subtitles.original: バイバイ！バイバイ！またねー！
subtitles.english: Bye bye! Bye bye! See you later!

subtitles.original: ということで、皆様ももうそろそろお時間なので、ししろの枠に行きましょう！ゴー！
subtitles.english: And so, since it's almost time for everyone, let's head over to Shishiro's stream! Go!

subtitles.original: 雪花ラミィ アイドル衣装
subtitles.english: Yukihana Lamy Idol Costume
